committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: An act to designate the John Archibald Campbell United States Courthouse.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates a certain building in Mobile, Alabama, as the John Archibald Campbell United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the John Archibald Campbell Federal Building-United States Courthouse.
An act to designate the John Archibald Campbell United States Courthouse.
